entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 33. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 33. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Local blowing snow. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 28. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 29.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 29. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
